text: Hilkaya onyeisi nchụaja, sịrị Shefan ode akwụkwọ, “Achọtala m Akwụkwọ Iwu22:8 Akwụkwọ Iwu a, nke a chọtara bụ akwụkwọ Diuteronomi, Dit 31:24-26; 2Ih 34:14 Nchọpụta akwụkwọ a, gosiri nʼụzọ pụtara ìhè oke nnupu isi dị nʼala Izrel megide iwu Chineke nʼoge eze Manase na-achị. nʼime ụlọnsọ Onyenwe anyị.” O nyere ya Shefan, onye nke gụkwara ya.
